p: Despite the extensive progress made regarding CLA production in Y. lipolytica, many possible improvements can be achieved in enhancing CLA production. One approach is to adjust the metabolic pathway, such as through the deletion of glycerol-3-phosphate dehydrogenase gene ( GUT2) or integration of additional key lipid synthesis genes into the Y. lipolytica genome by clustered regularly interspaced short palindromic repeats (CRISPR)/Cas9 technology to elevate the yield of lipids or free fatty acids [ 17, 35].
